name: EY
description: EY helps clients create long-term value for all stakeholders. Enabled by data and technology, our services and solutions provide trust through assurance and help clients transform, grow and operate.
features: Leverage robust frameworks and governance that instill confidence and empower responsible transformation.
Optimize performance, enrich customer and employee experiences, and unlock new sources of sustainable growth.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: EY exists to build a better working world, helping create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.
ShortDescription: People analytics provides data-driven insight for workforce strategy and planning, so that talent can be managed and developed to deliver clear business outcomes.
enhanced_description: EY offers services and solutions leveraging data and technology to help clients achieve long-term value, transformation, growth, and operational efficiency. Specifically, their offerings in talent management and employee engagement provide data-driven insights through people analytics for workforce strategy and planning. This enables clients to manage and develop talent, optimize performance, enrich employee experiences, unlock sustainable growth, and build a more diverse and inclusive workforce, all supported by robust frameworks and governance.
key_use_cases: Building a diverse and inclusive workforce
competitive_advantages: Focus on instilling confidence and trust through assurance
